page.title: 07THE MOUNTBATTEN CENTRE
page.content: The centre was completed by June 24 1983,and opened by Prince Andrew. More than 5,000 people have visited the centre in the last year.In the past there have been some major events to do with table and hockey.There are 20 full-time staff:11 part time and 30 casuals,who phone the centre and arrange time to go into work. The facilities are as follows: squash courts a full-sized football pitch a running track tennis courts a large sports hall a swimming pool The Mountbatten Centre has become a popular leisure centre in and around the Portsmouth area.
